template: We have an image with these objects: ['man', 'red bottle', 'window', 'greenery outside', 'blue wall', 'white plastic bag', 'yellow object inside bag', 'blue shirt', 'button on shirt', 'white button on shirt', 'blue stripe on shirt', 'blue stripe on shirt', 'blue stripe on shirt', 'blue stripe on shirt', 'blue stripe on shirt', 'blue stripe on shirt', 'blue stripe on shirt', 'blue stripe on shirt', 'blue stripe on shirt'].
